T02D1305:212b-1: nee r'atma yo gi ni s'a dha nam /
T02D1305:212b-3: bdag med rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1305:212b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1305:212b-5: dombi he ru ka'i zhal snga nas /
T02D1305:212b-6: kye yi rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rgyud las //
T02D1305:212b-7: de nyid thams cad yang dag bsdus pa yi //
T02D1305:213a-2: nam mkhar rje btsun bla ma dang //
T02D1305:213a-3: mi bskyod pa yi sku lta bu'i //
T02D1305:213a-4: mnga' bdag rdo rje dbang dmigs te //
T02D1305:213a-5: blo dang ldan pas phyag 'tshal mchod //
T02D1305:213a-6: snying gar rang gi sa bon bsam //
T02D1305:213a-7: mchod pa'i sprin ni rab tu dbul //
T02D1305:213a-8: rtag tu lha mo brgyad rnams kyis //
T02D1305:213a-9: bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba las //
T02D1305:213a-10: rnal 'byor ma lnga dkar mo stsogs //
T02D1305:213a-11: bdud rtsi lnga ni 'dzin par brjod //
T02D1305:213a-12: sngon mo gtum mo dombi n'i //
T02D1305:213a-13: ro dang bcas te 'khyud par ldan //
T02D1305:213a-14: rtag tu sdig pa bshags pa dang //
T02D1305:213a-15: bsod nams nyid la rjes yi rang //
T02D1305:213a-16: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro //
T02D1305:213a-17: byang chub sems ni rnam par gzung //
T02D1305:213a-18: dang por byams pa bsgom par bya //
T02D1305:213a-19: gnyis pa snying rje rnam par bsgom //
T02D1305:213a-20: gsum pa dga' ba bsgom par bya //
T02D1305:213a-21: kun gyi mtha' nas btang snyoms so //
T02D1305:213a-22: de rjes rgyal ba'i sngags brjod de //
T02D1305:213a-23: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham //
T02D1305:213a-24: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rnam bsgoms sngon gyi ni //
T02D1305:213a-25: rnal 'byor pas ni smon lam rjes su dran par bya //
T02D1305:213a-26: dang por re pha las ni nyi ma rnam par bsgom //
T02D1305:213a-27: nyi ma der ni h'um byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste //
T02D1305:213a-28: rdo rje de nyid kyis ni rnam par bsgom bya ba //
T02D1305:213a-29: ra ba dang ni gur yang rab tu bcing bar bya //
T02D1305:213a-30: shes rab ae yi gzugs can ma //
T02D1305:213a-31: blo ldan nam mkha'i khams bsam bya //
T02D1305:213a-32: der ni sa gzhi gru bzhi pa //
T02D1305:213a-33: ljang gu rnam par bsgom par bya //
T02D1305:213a-34: sa yi dkyil 'khor nang gnas par //
T02D1305:213a-35: chu yi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02D1305:213a-36: chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02D1305:213a-37: me yi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02D1305:213a-38: de la rlung gi dkyil 'khor lo //
T02D1305:213a-39: rlung gi dkyil 'khor nang gnas par //
T02D1305:213a-40: bdag kyang bsam par bya ba ste //
T02D1305:213a-41: ae wam nyid du bdag dang ni //
T02D1305:213a-43: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1305:213a-44: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan //
T02D1305:213a-45: dra ba dra phyed yang dag ldan //
T02D1305:213a-46: rdo rje thig gis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1305:213a-47: 'khor lo der ni srog song pa //
T02D1305:213a-48: bco lnga rnam par bsgom par bya //
T02D1305:213a-49: rnal 'byor ma yi phyogs mtshams las //
T02D1305:213a-50: gdan ni bco lnga nyid du brjod //
T02D1305:213a-51: gdan gyi steng du zla ba yin //
T02D1305:213a-52: zla steng rnam 'byed blo ldan pas //
T02D1305:213a-53: de dag nang song sa bon ni //
T02D1305:213b-0: @213b rtsa ba'i dbyangs yig la sogs bsam //
T02D1305:213b-1: me long mnyam nyid ye shes dag / zla ba nyi ma rab tu grags //
T02D1305:213b-2: aam las byung ba'i gi gug ni //
T02D1305:213b-3: so sor rtog pa nyid du brjod //
T02D1305:213b-4: 'di rnams gcig gyur nan tan te //
T02D1305:213b-5: rdzogs pa chos dbyings dag pa ste //
T02D1305:213b-6: rnal 'byor ma ni rnams kyi lus //
T02D1305:213b-7: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid grags //
T02D1305:213b-8: nyi zla dag dang gri gug gis //
T02D1305:213b-10: yang ni 'dres par gyur nas phyis //
T02D1305:213b-11: bdag med rnal 'byor ma bskyed de //
T02D1305:213b-12: kha dog nag mo grags chen mo //
T02D1305:213b-13: phyag rgya ldas ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D1305:213b-14: g-yas na gri gug 'jigs chen ma //
T02D1305:213b-15: g-yon pa nyid ni padma'i snod //
T02D1305:213b-16: g-yas min par ni kha tv'am ga / stag gi pags pas smad dkris so //
T02D1305:213b-18: bdag med rnal 'byor ma la sogs pa rnams kyi brjod do //
T02D1305:213b-20: pukka s'i la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1305:213b-22: sa bon rnams ni dkar mo la sogs pa rnams kyi brjod do //
T02D1305:213b-23: aoo aam sa bon dag na 'og dang steng gi gnas pa dag gir yang brjod do //
T02D1305:213b-24: sems dang phan pa rin chen bdag / tshe dpag med dang don grub kyis //
T02D1305:213b-25: bdag med la sogs phyag rgya gdab //
T02D1305:213b-26: shes rab 'phar mar rnam par gnas //
T02D1305:213b-27: sems dang phan pa'i rin chen bdag /
T02D1305:213b-28: tshe dpag med pa bde gshegs kyis //
T02D1305:213b-29: mtshams nas pukka s'i la sogs //
T02D1305:213b-30: rim pa'i rjes la phyag rgyas gdab //
T02D1305:213b-31: rnal 'byor ma ni bzhi rnams kyis //
T02D1305:213b-32: rtag tu bsgoms gnas nyid la ni //
T02D1305:213b-33: zhe sdang gti mug ser sna dang //
T02D1305:213b-34: 'dod chags rdo rje phyag rgyas gdab //
T02D1305:213b-35: 'og dang steng dang sku gsung gi / phyag rgyas byed pas rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1305:213b-36: phyag rgyas gdab dang rtag pa 'dis //
T02D1305:213b-37: de nas phyag rgya nyi shu brjod //
T02D1305:213b-38: dbang por rdo rje gshin goo r'i //
T02D1305:213b-39: chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1305:213b-40: lus ngan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1305:213b-41: dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1305:213b-42: dbang ldan du ni pukka s'i //
T02D1305:213b-43: de bzhin 'tshed mer ri khrod ma //
T02D1305:213b-44: bden bral du ni gtum mo sta //
T02D1305:213b-46: yang ni shar sgor dkar mo ste //
T02D1305:213b-47: de bzhin lhor ni chom rkun ma //
T02D1305:213b-48: nub kyi sgo la ro langs ma //
T02D1305:213b-49: de bzhin byang du ghasma r'i //
T02D1305:213b-50: 'og tu sa spyod mar bshad de //
T02D1305:213b-51: steng du mkha' spyod mar brjod do //
T02D1305:214a-2: thams cad dam par dga' ba'o //
T02D1305:214a-3: snying gar rang gis bon bsam //
T02D1305:214a-4: 'od zer phyung ste de nas ni //
T02D1305:214a-5: sangs rgyas rnams ni spyan drangs te //
T02D1305:214a-6: lha mo brgyad kyis mchod par bya //
T02D1305:214a-7: phyi nas gsol ba gdab pa ni //
T02D1305:214a-8: bcom ldan bdag nyid chen po rnams //
T02D1305:214a-9: bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun //
T02D1305:214a-10: bdag la dbang bskur la sogs gsol //
T02D1305:214a-11: bum pa bdud rtsi lngas gang ba //
T02D1305:214a-12: mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyis dbang bskur //
T02D1305:214a-13: sangs rgyas kun gyis bskur nas ni //
T02D1305:214a-14: dbu rgyan la ni thugs bdag yin //
T02D1305:214a-15: dang por nag po bsgom par bya //
T02D1305:214a-16: gnyis pa dmar po bsgom par bya //
T02D1305:214a-17: gsum pa la ni ser por bsgom //
T02D1305:214a-18: de bzhin bzhi par ljang gu ste //
T02D1305:214a-19: lnga pa kha dog sngon po nyid //
T02D1305:214a-20: drug pa dkar po'i tshul can de //
T02D1305:214a-21: yan lag drug sgom rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1305:214a-22: phyi nas kha dog rnam par spangs //
T02D1305:214a-23: gzugs phung la ni rdo rje ma //
T02D1305:214a-24: tshor ba la ni dkar mor brjod //
T02D1305:214a-27: rnam shes phung po'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1305:214a-28: bdag med rnal 'byor ma rnams so //
T02D1305:214a-31: sa ni pukka s'i ru bshad //
T02D1305:214a-32: de bzhin chu khams ri khrod ma //
T02D1305:214a-33: me ni gtum mor shes par bya //
T02D1305:214a-34: rlung ni g-yung mor rab tu grags //
T02D1305:214a-35: gzugs la dkar mor rtag tu bshad //
T02D1305:214a-36: sgra la chom rkun ma rab grags //
T02D1305:214a-37: dri yi cha la ro langs ma //
T02D1305:214a-38: ro la ghasma r'i rab brjod //
T02D1305:214a-39: reg bya sa spyod mar bshad de //
T02D1305:214a-40: chos kyi dbyings la mkha' spyod ma //
T02D1305:214a-41: rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas //
T02D1305:214a-43: mig dag gti mug rdo rje yin //
T02D1305:214a-44: rna bar zhe sdang rdo rje ma //
T02D1305:214a-45: sna la ser sna mar bshad de //
T02D1305:214a-47: lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma //
T02D1305:214a-48: yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1305:214a-49: go cha 'di rnams ches dag pas //
T02D1305:214a-50: dbang po rnams kyi rnam par sbyor //
T02D1305:214a-51: skyes pa'i thod pa'i phreng bas bskor //
T02D1305:214a-52: gri gug lta ni gcod pa ste //
T02D1305:214a-53: thod pa nyon mongs mgo bo yi //
T02D1305:214a-54: phreng ba'i steng du gnas pa'o //
T02D1305:214a-55: bla ma slob dpon 'dod lha la //
T02D1305:214b-0: bla ma @214b rdo rje 'dzin pa la //
T02D1305:214b-1: smod tshig mi mnyan pa yi phyir //
T02D1305:214b-2: nyan pa dag tu rna cha 'dzin //
T02D1305:214b-3: sngags zlos phyir ni mgul do ste //
T02D1305:214b-4: lag gdub srog chags gsod pa spangs //
T02D1305:214b-5: phyag rgya bsten phyir ska rags te //
T02D1305:214b-6: sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgya yis //
T02D1305:214b-7: rtag tu lus la gdab par bya //
T02D1305:214b-9: aom aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ri r'i li l'i ae aee ao aoo a'am sv'a h'a /
T02D1305:214b-10: phyag rgya'i rnam dag bshad bya ba //
T02D1305:214b-11: 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi bskyod pa //
T02D1305:214b-12: 'od dpag med pa rna cha'i bdag / mgul gyi
T02D1305:214b-13: phreng ba rin chen bdag / lag pa la ni
T02D1305:214b-14: rnam snang brjod // ska rags la ni don yod gnas //
T02D1305:214b-15: 'di rnams dag la phyag rgya lnga //
T02D1305:214b-17: rnal 'byor mas ni rab tu bzung //
T02D1305:214b-18: nang gi rnal 'byor bshad par bya //
T02D1305:214b-19: mo gzugs 'jig rten dbang du byed //
T02D1305:214b-20: khro bo'i gzugs kyis sreg par byed //
T02D1305:214b-21: a'a li k'a li snyoms zhugs pas //
T02D1305:214b-22: phyi rol gyi ni gnyis gnyis bkab //
T02D1305:214b-23: grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngas ni //
T02D1305:214b-24: aom aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha sv'a h'a //
T02D1305:214b-25: 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngas ni //
T02D1305:214b-26: aom a'a ka ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am /
T02D1305:214b-27: a'a dy'a nu tpanna tv'a ta /
T02D1305:214b-28: aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1305:214b-29: rnal 'byor ma ni bdag med ma'i //
T02D1305:214b-30: sdom pa'i dbye ba bshad par bya //
T02D1305:214b-31: lte bar phyag rgya chen po gnas //
T02D1305:214b-32: rtag tu bde ba chen po 'dzag / rno phyir me yi gzugs su ni //
T02D1305:214b-33: de yang ma mo rnams kyis brtags //
T02D1305:214b-34: dang por dbyangs yig rang bzhin te //
T02D1305:214b-35: glor ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags //
T02D1305:214b-36: 'jig rten gsum du khyab gnas kyang //
T02D1305:214b-37: so so'i skye bos mi shes so //
T02D1305:214b-38: bdag med lus kyi nang na gnas //
T02D1305:214b-39: gzhom med pa ni kha 'og tu //
T02D1305:214b-40: rgyun mi 'chad par byang chub sems //
T02D1305:214b-41: sbyor bas rtag par 'dzin pa nyid //
T02D1305:214b-42: de phyir lus la rtsa gsum gnas //
T02D1305:214b-44: sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs kyi ni //
T02D1305:214b-45: las kyi phyag rgya nyid du bcas //
T02D1305:214b-46: rkyang ma shes rab rang bzhin dang //
T02D1305:214b-47: ro ma thabs kyi yan lag gnas //
T02D1305:214b-48: aa ba dh'u t'i dbus gnas su //
T02D1305:214b-49: gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa ste //
T02D1305:214b-50: bde chen byed pa'i gzugs can ma //
T02D1305:214b-51: mi bskyod 'bab pa rkyang ma ste //
T02D1305:214b-53: kun 'dar mgon po dpag med kyi //
T02D1305:214b-54: rtag tu gnas kyi dngos po ma //
T02D1305:215a-2: rang gi lus la rtsa rnam gsum //
T02D1305:215a-3: rdo rje rin chen chu skyes kyis //
T02D1305:215a-4: sku gsung thugs ni 'dzag pa ste //
T02D1305:215a-5: gcig pa'i dus ni rdo rje yi //
T02D1305:215a-6: rin chen 'dzin pas dpyid nyid do //
T02D1305:215a-7: dpag med mgon gyi mngon rdzogs pa'i //
T02D1305:215a-8: sangs rgyas rang bzhin brjod pa ste //
T02D1305:215a-9: mtshan mo'ang nyin par dag tu yang //
T02D1305:215a-10: rtag tu ye shes skye ba nyid //
T02D1305:215a-11: lhan cig skyes pa mchog dga' ba //
T02D1305:215a-12: pha yi bde ba bzang po 'bab //
T02D1305:215a-13: dper na gang yang mtshan mo'i khyim nang du //
T02D1305:215a-14: zas za lus kyis yongs su byed 'dod pa //
T02D1305:215a-15: spar ba mar me yis ni mun rum ltas //
T02D1305:215a-16: de bzhin gti mug mun pas bde ba yin //
T02D1305:215a-17: 'di ltar shes bya srid pa'i mtsho dug chu //
T02D1305:215a-19: bkres pas gdungs pa rlabs dang 'khril shing rnam 'khril mya ngam gcig pu 'gram chen po //
T02D1305:215a-20: gang phyir byang chub blo ldan skye bo skad cig kyang ni rang don gcig gnyer ba //
T02D1305:215a-21: gti mug zhags pa'i gos ni spangs nas pha rol mi 'gro bdag gis ngo mtshar che //
T02D1305:215a-22: blo bzangs dang po bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom par byed dang phan pa'i phyag rgya dang //
T02D1305:215a-23: sngags ni rnam dag gug skyed go cha thams cad nges par dran pa bral mi bya //
T02D1305:215a-24: phyi nas blo bzangs rangs shing skad cig rgyun du de nyid gcig gis sems dang ldan //
T02D1305:215a-25: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa srid pa las byung lhan cig skyes pa rtag tu bsam //
T02D1305:215a-26: ra dha longs spyod tshong 'dus sna tshogs sbrang ldan kang kha'i khab ces bya ming du //
T02D1305:215a-27: stag zhon sna tshogs sbrul mgo gdengs pas brgyan cing gang zhig bzod ldan spyod pa gang //
T02D1305:215a-28: de nas gzhan phan 'dod phyir 'jig rten don du gang bshad sgrub thabs dbang po 'di //
T02D1305:215a-29: gsang ba'i shes rab yan lag 'du ba bdag gis gang bshad rgyal sras bzod par mdzod //
T02D1305:215a-30: bdud rtsi 'od kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so /
T02D1305:215a-32: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya dha ra dang /
